short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e: Displays unread articles from the Nextcloud News App
short.de: Zeigt ungelesene Artikel aus der Nextcloud News App an.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e: The extension checks for new articles in a regular interval and shows a preview.
